290182.<pipipi_off>\n開催期間内に 各地の町へ入ると\nギフトカードが だ:
Enter any town during the campaign period to earn a Welcome Stamp!
Talk to the Gift Clerk Leafy in Langao, Tsusukul, Agrani, Pukulet, or Lane and show her your Gift Card to receive gifts!
You can check your Gift Card at any time to see what gifts you're eligible for. It'll change daily, so please check it out!
